image_prompt: A photo-realistic, cinematic wide shot inside a modern Australian manufacturing facility. The scene features a diverse group of maintenance engineers and plant managers (men and women) wearing standard high-visibility vests, hard hats, and safety glasses. They are standing near a large industrial conveyor belt system and a series of heavy motors. One engineer is holding a tablet (back of device visible only) pointing toward a machine, implying data scanning. The lighting is professional and industrial, with a mix of cool blue ambient light and warm task lighting.
